meanings.definition: A person who tampers with something, especially in a harmful or unauthorized way.
meanings.sent1: The tamperers were caught trying to break into the computer system.
meanings.sent2: The police warned the community about the tamperers targeting mailboxes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous tamperers thought it would be funny to switch all the street signs around.
meanings.sent4: The tamperers of nature, the beavers, built an impressive dam in the river.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the tamperers, for they can cause great damage if left unchecked.
